title: “You’re despicable”: Fox News panel derails over Greta Thunberg
text:
Knowles again said the “international left and her parents” are “exploiting a girl with many mental illnesses,” saying, “She is mentally ill. She has autism, she has obsessive-compulsive disorder, she has selective mutism, she had depression.”

“You are despicable,” Hahn said. “You’re a grown-up! Be a grown-up.”

UPDATE — 9:33 pm ET: A Fox News spokesperson said in a statement provided to Mediaite, “The comment made by Michael Knowles who was a guest on The Story tonight was disgraceful – we apologize to Greta Thunberg and to our viewers.”
